Metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10087 affecting package fltk for versions less than 1.3.8-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2016-10087 affecting package fltk for versions less than 1.3.8-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package fltk is earlier than 1.3.8-1, affected by CVE-2016-10087
